What is a fundamental issue in blockchain systems today that Verus ID aims to solve?

One fundamental issue in blockchain systems today is the trade-off between decentralized, censorship-resistant public systems and the risk to your cryptocurrency assets. This trade-off has been considered an acceptable price for having full control over your own funds and blockchain assets.

In fact, trading off decentralized, censorship resistant public systems for this risk to your cryptocurrency assets is such a fundamental issue in blockchain systems today that it is considered an acceptable price for having the benefit of full control over your own funds and blockchain assets.Verus ID provides an elegant solution to these previously unsolved, fundamental problems, and also provides quantum-ready friendly identity names and blockchain funds addresses as self-sovereign, revocable, recoverable identities that provide the following advantages over today’s blockchain systems:

What advantages do Verus IDs have over today's blockchain systems?
